00207 
00215 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00216                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00217 {
00218     // Check the number of arguments
00219     if (nrhs<2 || ((nrhs%2)!=0) || nlhs>1)
00220         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00221     
00222     // Argument vector
00223     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00224     
00225     // Option processing
00226     int dstCn = 0;
00227     for (int i=2; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00228         string key = rhs[i].toString();
00229         if (key=="DstCn")
00230             dstCn = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00231         else
00232             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00233     }
00234     
00235     // Process
00236     Mat src(rhs[0].toMat()), dst;
00237     int code = ColorConv[rhs[1].toString()];
00238     cvtColor(src, dst, code, dstCn);
00239     plhs[0] = MxArray(dst);
00240 }
